markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Starlit Spells](/Feats.aspx?ID=4070) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064)

</column>

---

The stars reveal and punish your enemies. You can cast [_faerie fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) and 3rd-level [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269) as occult innate spells, each once per day.
name: Starlit Spells
